name: Beetle Bunt
description:
Beetle Bunt Beetle Bunt is a puzzle game about a beetle that likes to flip things over.

 This game is about flipping objects over. Help Herc the beetle shove tablets under the light, revealing inscriptions on the other side. Beat challenging block rotation and block position puzzles while testing your platforming skills.

Meet other beetles.

Herc the beetle encounters several other beetles. Each beetle changes the puzzle in a unique and distinctly challenging way. Once you've mastered puzzles with just tablets, try puzzles with new beetles!  This game is inspired by my love of insects.  Herc is a Hercules Beetle or Dynastes Hercules.

Beat each level to uncover a beetle's story.

Follow the story of past beetles by viewing a inscriptions unlocked after each puzzle!

Create your own records.

Set your personal best in each level. The game saves your best scores for each level so that you can improve and look for optimal routes to take. View your smallest number of flips and shortest time taken per level. Hitting records is all determined by you.

Make and share your own levels (beta).

Though still under test, the Level Editor allows you to make your own Beetle Bunt levels and share the (base64 encoded) level code with others. Share with friends!
